constituent: iron, metal, gold, lose, drop, husband
koohiiStory1: Iron is a metal that gradually becomes lost due to oxidation and rust.
koohiiStory2: Compare with pig-iron (#270). In moving from pig-iron to iron, some of the metal´s maleability is LOST. (The only difference between the two kanji is that IRON has knee-less, unbending legs, while PIG-IRON (270) has very supple, bendable legs.).
words:
鉄棒(かなぼう): iron rod, crowbar, horizontal bar (gymnastics)
製鉄(せいてつ): iron manufacture
鉄鋼(てっこう): iron and steel
鉄片(てっぺん): iron scraps
私鉄(してつ): private railway
鉄(てつ): iron
鉄橋(てっきょう): railway bridge, iron bridge
鉄道(てつどう): railroad
鉄砲(てっぽう): gun
地下鉄(ちかてつ): underground train, subway
